ApplyInternetAddress.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: dc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ApplyInternetAddress
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AddrType": "0",
    "MaskLen": "30",
    "AddrProto": "0"
}
ApplyInternetAddress.title: 申请互联网BGP IPv4地址

ApplyInternetAddress.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: dc.tencentcloudapi.com

X-TC-Action: ApplyInternetAddress
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AddrType": "1",
    "MaskLen": "30",

CreateCloudAttachService.input:
https://dc.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=CreateCloudAttachService
&Data.Name=test
&Data.IdcAddress=北京东城区IDC地址
&Data.IdcType=CUCC
&Data.Bandwidth=100
&Data.Telephone=18888888888
&Data.Remarks=字符串
&<公共请求参数>

    "Response": {
        "CloudAttach": {

CreateCloudAttachService.title: 创建敏捷上云服务

CreateDirectConnect.document: 申请物理专线，接入点为北京航信，中国移动线路，云端端口为千兆单模光口（1000Base-LX）。
CreateDirectConnect.input:
https://dc.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=CreateDirectConnect
&DirectConnectName=北京航信物理专线1
&AccessPointId=ap-cn-beijing-hx
&LineOperator=ChinaMobile
&CircuitCode=北京航信ANE0348NP
&Location=北京市海淀区西格玛A大厦14楼
&PortType=1000Base-LX
&Bandwidth=1000
&CustomerName=张三
&CustomerContactMail=12345@qq.com
&CustomerContactNumber=18812345678
&<公共请求参数>
CreateDirectConnect.title: 申请物理专线1

CreateDirectConnect.document: 申请物理专线，接入点为南山，中国移动线路，云端端口为千兆单模光口（1000Base-LX），有冗余专线。
CreateDirectConnect.input:
https://dc.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=CreateDirectConnect
&DirectConnectName=物理专线1
&AccessPointId=ap-cn-shenzhen-ns-A
&LineOperator=ChinaMobile
&CircuitCode=深圳南山ANE0348NP
&Location=广东省深圳市南山区科技园A大厦14楼
&PortType=1000Base-LX
&Bandwidth=1000
&RedundantDirectConnectId=dc-abcdedf
&Vlan=100
&TencentAddress=172.168.1.1/30
&CustomerAddress=172.168.1.2/30
&CustomerName=张三
&CustomerContactMail=12345@qq.com
&CustomerContactNumber=18812345678
&<公共请求参数>
CreateDirectConnect.title: 申请物理专线2

CreateDirectConnectTunnel.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: dc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDirectConnectTunnel
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DirectConnectId": "dc-juystu9z",
    "DirectConnectTunnelName": "testvif",
    "NetworkType": "CCN",
    "NetworkRegion": "ap-guangzhou",
    "DirectConnectGatewayId": "dcg-du8uzrih",
    "Bandwidth": 100,
    "RouteType": "BGP",
    "Vlan": 1001
}
CreateDirectConnectTunnel.title: 创建云交换服务通道
